# Board of Zoning Appeals Meeting - Speaker Sign-up

Board of Zoning Appeals (BZA) meetings are open to the public. If you wish to speak at a BZA meeting, it is recommended that you sign up ahead of time using the BZA Speaker Sign Up form below. Testimony may be provided as follows:

  1. **(Pre-register) By Video** : Register to Speak below and submit a YouTube Video no later than 3:00 p.m. two days before the hearing. Only standard YouTube videos will be accepted, not YouTube shorts. Staff will call you after registering to confirm your preferred method of testifying and provide additional information. Please review the Instructions for Video Testimony Submissions webpage for more information and to submit your video.

  2. **(Preregister or Day of) In Person** : Register to Speak below no later than 3:00 p.m. the day before the hearing. Staff will call you after registering to confirm your preferred method of testifying and provide additional information. Persons who did not pre-register may provide testimony during the hearing in the Board Auditorium at 12000 Government Center Parkway.




Fairfax County is committed to nondiscrimination on the basis of disability in all county programs, services and activities and supports the Americans with Disabilities Act by making reasonable accommodations for persons with disabilities. For additional information on ADA, call 703-324-1334 (TTY 711).

## Speaking Time Allocation

  * Three minutes for speakers addressing the Board on their own behalf or on behalf of a business.
  * Five minutes for speakers representing a civic, citizen, or homeowners association. Only one representative per association is allotted five minutes.
  * Individual association members may speak on their own behalf with a three-minute limit. 
  * In the event of unusual circumstances, the Chairman may request comments be held to shorter time limits.



## Audio Visual Support

Registered speakers who have presentations which require audio visual should contact the Department of Cable and Consumer Services - Communications Productions Division (Channel 16) to arrange for AV support.

## Speaker Sign Up Form

Please completely fill out each field in the form below. Incomplete forms will not be accepted.

Date of Public Hearing

Application Number (e.g. “SP/VC/A 2014-MV-999)

First & Last Name

Group or Association Name (If none, enter N/A)

Full Address (Include City, State, Zip)

E-Mail Address

Phone Number

Testimony Method Select One OptionIn PersonVideo Submission
